title: ruined by a shaco
body:
I've been having what I think is a streak of decent games where I have not been the weakest link in the team, but last night I just got fking stomped by a shaco who camped me mid (I was doing ok against the annie but every time I applied a bit of pressure shaco was there).

Any tips to ruin a shaco? I've not been owned that hard in game for a while and I want to close this gap.

replies.body: i think the best thing is to have a jungler who can ward shacos jungle for you. Just keep an idea of his general location and play safe when he is nearby.
Ward his jungle path so you know where he is at all times. Pink wards in odd places can also be very effective.
I definitely could have warded more pinks.

The best strategy is to pink ward the side of midline with the thinnest wall that touches the river. If your top half, ward raptors. If you are bot side ward raptors. Place the ward as close to the wall as possible. Then green/trinket ward the river bush.

Hug that side of the map, you will see shaco coming through the river even if he is invis as the pink ward invis radius is longer than it's vision radius. If he comes up the path you see him anyway.

Stops pretty much any invis hero. Same trick works on any walls. Pink on one side of the wall, green on the other.
Pink Pink MORE PINKS! For real though warding is really important to avoid ganks :D

He is very squishy, usually takes ignite instead of flash, and uses his only escape ability to get into lane to gank you. If you're playing a champion with decent burst, theres a good chance you can just kill him if he tries to gank you, especially if hes on less than full hp, so try to be on the lookout for that.
q,pop ult, auto, you burst the wrong shaco, dead.
